availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Office of the governor, in which the constitution of Georgia vests the executive power of the state. Governor from November 6, 1857, to June 17, 1865: Joseph Emerson Brown. Governor from June 17, 1865, to December 14, 1865: James Johnson. Governor from December 14, 1865, to January 13, 1868: Charles Jones Jenkins.

ab.bibl: "Former Governors of Georgia," National Governors Association, https://www.nga.org/former-governors/georgia/ (accessed on September 3, 2020).
